input_args.passage: 'Cerdic of Wessex | Cerdic was the Saxon leader defeated by the Britons at the Battle of Mount Badon, probably fought in 490 (and possibly later, but not later than ...'
input_args.claim: 'From this, we can deduce that the West Saxon forces, led by Cerdic and Cynric of the Gewisse, faced the Britons in battle.'
